SQL.LOAD: SELECT task_id, subscriber_type_id, subscriber_status_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, subscriber_task_id FROM elp_subscriber_task WHERE subscriber_task_id = :subscriber_task_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select st.SUBSCRIBER_TASK_ID ,st.TASK_ID ,st.SUBSCRIBER_TYPE_ID ,GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM(st.SUBSCRIBER_TYPE_ID, :language_id) SUBSCRIBER_TYPE_DESC ,st.SUBSCRIBER_STATUS_ID ,GETDESCRIPTIONFROMLISTITEM(st.SUBSCRIBER_STATUS_ID, :language_id) SUBSCRIBER_STATUS_DESC ,t.code TASK_CODE ,t.description TASK_DESC from ELP_SUBSCRIBER_TASK st inner join elp_task t on st.task_id = t.task_id where 1=1 --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_subscriber_task SET task_id = :task_id, subscriber_type_id = :subscriber_type_id, subscriber_status_id = :subscriber_status_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE subscriber_task_id = :subscriber_task_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_subscriber_task ( task_id, subscriber_type_id, subscriber_status_id, created_by, subscriber_task_id ) VALUES ( :task_id, :subscriber_type_id, :subscriber_status_id, :created_by, :subscriber_task_id )
